item.title: Build_vulhub
item.description: Ubuntu Server 安装 Vulhub 根据官方网站的说明，需要安装docker和docker-compose，需要用pip安装docker-compose，官方的演示视

item.title: Build_lab
item.description: Ubuntu Server 安装 DVWA 和 SQLI-Lab 环境下载 本地虚拟机安装ubuntu server 20.04.1 LTS 然后使用xshell连接服务器，采用xftp上传一键下载环境的脚本，脚本内命令如下： #!/bin/sh

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a bad scholar, learning because I am too boring. This is a blog that summarizes knowledge, I will record everything I learned here. Hereby declare: Knowledge comes from the Internet, but I will try to avoid mistakes. I will try my best to make the method really work. Sometimes I will express some personal opinions, please stay rational. The most important thing is to hope this knowledge is useful to you.
